events.title: The Kid LAROI First Time Tour 2024
events.location: Houston, Texas, United States Of America
events.description: Doors - 6:00pm Show - 7:30pm All Ages **All support acts are subject to change without notice** To reduce staff contact with guest belongings, we have implemented the following bag policy: Bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" are allowed in the venue. All bags will be searched prior to entry. Bags that are not clear will be subject to additional search.

events.title: The Kid LAROI First Time Tour 2024
events.location: Irving, Texas, United States Of America
events.description: To reduce staff contact with guest belongings, we have implemented the following bag policy: we will allow clear plastic, vinyl or PVC tote bags no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" and/or small clutch bags (6"x 9").
